articles.author: ELAINE KURTENBACH
articles.title: Shares are higher in Asia in an upbeat start to the new year - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: World markets began 2026 with gains, with benchmarks in Britain and South Korea hitting records as optimism over the future of artificial intelligence...
articles.content:
BANGKOK (AP) World markets began 2026 with gains, with benchmarks in Britain and South Korea hitting records as optimism over the future of artificial intelligence carried over into the new year.
